title: -ALL RUNES ARE 10IP AT THE MOMENT-
body: just incase you missed it like me, all runes are 10 ip but the ip wont be refunded when new currency system rolls out but still fun to play with!

replies.body:
While this is a good news, I have to point out that the IP price of rune pages had not yet been reduced, so the reduced price of runes are not much use for me, I'd rather not buy anymore runes unless if I decide to edit one of my rune pages and if I need new runes.
I don't have enough rp to buy rune pages, by the way.

The reason there's been no change to the price of Rune Pages is because they'll be carried over into the new Rune system. You'll still have all the rune pages you have now, you'll still be able to buy more rune pages, the difference is they'll be editable in champion select (like the current Mastery system). Since the Rune Pages will carry over, with no (planned) changes to their availability, it makes sense that they're not receiving a discount.

You can find this information in Riot Cactopus' thread on the NA boards about purchasing runes before the pre-season [link: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/RlNQkO39-buying-runes-between-now-and-preseason ].

That said, it may be worthwhile to wait until the new rune system is in place before spending IP/RP on more rune pages, as you may find you prefer to simply have 2 active pages and just edit them in champion select, rather than having a dozen or so rune pages with various presets. The choice is ultimately yours, however.

In preseason the rune system is being replaced anyway, so I wouldn't worry too much about getting new rune pages since what you have only has to last you till (not even) the end of the year.

More details here:
http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/riot-pls-leveling-ip-and-rewards/
